title: 47. Your company has multiple GCP projects in several regions, and your operations team have created numerous gcloud configurations for most common operational needs. They have asked your help to retrieve an inactive gcloud configuration and the GKE clusters that use it, using the least number of steps. What command should you execute to retrieve this information?
alternatives: A. Execute gcloud config configurations describe.
B. Execute gcloud config configurations activate, then gcloud config list.
C. Execute kubectl config use-context, then kubectl config view.
